issue.title: (reserved for DNS seed issues)
issue.body:
As of 2017-12-17
```
* Mainnet
OK   seed.bitcoin.sipa.be (40 results)
OK   dnsseed.bluematt.me (33 results)
OK   dnsseed.bitcoin.dashjr.org (38 results)
OK   seed.bitcoinstats.com (50 results)
OK   bitseed.xf2.org (13 results)
FAIL seed.bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch

* Testnet
FAIL testnet-seed.bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch
OK   seed.tbtc.petertodd.org (38 results)
OK   testnet-seed.bluematt.me (3 results)
```

Edit: the utility used to check these is now in https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools

events.body:
Thanks for the report.
Had to restart the bitcoin-seeder, though it was running (and reporting to the logs)...
Thanks for fixing, updated the issue.
That should be fixed now; had to restart the server.
Thanks. Yes yours is fixed now, @jonasschnelli 's broken again :p
Well, I guess you don't have to change the title at least...
Updated OP

rename.to: One mainnet, two testnet DNS seeds return no results

events.body: @laanwj Currently dnsseed.bluematt.me is failing, adding (it seems) >4 minutes to the time needed to shutdown bitcoind.

It is? Seems to work fine for me. Which server is failing for you?

On January 10, 2017 6:49:49 AM PST, R E Broadley <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>@laanwj Currently dnsseed.bluematt.me is failing, adding (it seems) >4
>minutes to the time needed to shutdown bitcoind.
>
>-- 
>You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
>Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
>https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/8861#issuecomment-271594505
@TheBlueMatt 's is working fine, the other ones are still having problems (return no results).
seed.tbtc.petertodd.org should be working again.
IMO bitseed.xf2.org is low value and can be removed.  (it will continue to stay up and resolvable ad infinitum)
seed.bitcoin.sipa.be should be working again (firewall issue, i thought it was fixed already).
Everything is okay now, congrats everyone.

rename.from: One mainnet, two testnet DNS seeds return no results

events.body: @jonasschnelli Your DNS seeds (both testnet and mainnet) are experiencing issues at the moment.

Mainnet seed seems running fine.
There was a strange issue on the testnet seed (now resolved, currently investigating).
`seed.tbtc.petertodd.org` seems to be down.
@s-tikhomirov Thanks! Looks like something was down on my server; rebooted and it seems to be working fine now.

** server can't find seed.tbtc.petertodd.org: SERVFAIL again... @petertodd 
FAIL seed.bitcoin.sipa.be
FAIL seed.bitcoinstats.com
@sysmanalex Fixed.
seed.bitcoinstats.com has auto recovered as well
